Title: PERCENT_RANK
Feature:
PERCENT_RANK() OVER (
  [ PARTITION BY partition_expression ] 
  [ ORDER BY order_list ]
)
Description: PERCENT_RANK() is a window function that returns the relative percent rank of a given row. The following formula is used to calculate the percent rank:
(rank - 1) / (number of rows in the window or partition - 1)
Examples: SELECT PERCENT_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS percent_rank_value;
